definition: to set/to fix/to determine/to decide/to order
to put on a hat/to be first/to dub
word/statement/speech/lyrics/CL:組|组[zu3],個|个[ge4]/a form of lyric poetry, flourishing in the Song dynasty 宋朝|宋朝[Song4 chao2]/CL:首[shou3]

sentences.english: We can't use the indefinite article with this noun.
sentences.chinese: 我們不可以在這個名詞前用不定冠詞。

sentences.english: To recognize and use the indefinite articles to talk about things that are countable.
sentences.chinese: 識別並使用不定冠詞談論可數名詞。

sentences.english: Read the passage again. Put a line under the words a and the.
sentences.chinese: 重讀課文，劃出不定冠詞和定冠詞。
